tool_description: Extracts and validates image URLs from property listing HTML content, filtering for property photos and removing thumbnails.

min_image_size.description: Minimum image dimension in pixels to include

max_images.description: Maximum number of images to extract

error_messages: Empty HTML content: Provide valid HTML content containing images.
Invalid size parameters: min_image_size must be positive integer, max_images must be between 1 and 100.
No images found: HTML content does not contain any valid image URLs.
usage: Provide html_content from property listings and configure filtering parameters. The tool will extract high-quality property image URLs.

image_urls.description: Array of extracted property image URLs

thumbnails_filtered.description: Number of thumbnail images that were filtered out
